name: The Last Spartan
description:
I'm 16 years old game programmer, 3d and 2d artist. I want create big game studio and I need your help.

I created this game in a short amount of time, with  Unity 3D. It was a whole new experience and this confirmed my wish to work in the video games industry. I hope you will enjoy playing this game, like I enjoyed creating it. Please donate, because it's important for my game studio. Thanks :)
